page.title: 14SHOPS IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: Many of the shops in my village are not normally found in what most people would call a village. this may be because of it's size.(4000 people) there are as you would expect many typical corner shops,but hereare some of the unusual ones: 1)furniture shop 2)d.i.y. store 3)fish and chip restaurant(as well as an ordinary separate chip shop) 4)insurance broker 5)specialist shoe shop 6)microwave shop 7)c.b. radio shop As you can see above we think some of the shops are fairly unique for a village.
